rule.name: AuraEnabledMethodShouldPublishLogsInFinallyBlock
rule.description: Ensure AuraEnabled methods have `ok.Logger.publish()` in finally block.

rule.name: LoggerInitClassMatchesClassName
rule.message: The argument to ok.Logger.getLogger should match the class name.
rule.description: Ensure that the class passed as an argument to `ok.Logger.getLogger()` matches the class in which the logger is being called.
